computer.description:
The Sord M-100ACE was the professional version of the M-170, offering as standard a floppy disc controller card, a single or dual 5" 143 KB floppy disc unit and a colour graphic video card.
Several I/O interfaces were also added and business oriented developpement tools could be used: FORTRAN and BASIC compilers and COBOL language.
Four successive version were sold - M100-I to M100-IV - offering various hardware and design improvements. The model pictured here is a M100-III.
computer.name: M-100ACE
